control.label: [COLOR=greenlime]$INFO[MusicPlayer.Title][/COLOR]
control.visible: Player.HasAudio + !Skin.HasSetting(overlay) + ![Window.IsActive(107) | Window.IsActive(104) | Window.IsActive(10133) | Window.IsActive(10112) | Window.IsActive(0) | Window.IsActive(500) | Window.IsActive(50)]

control.label: $INFO[MusicPlayer.Artist]
control.visible: Player.HasAudio + !Skin.HasSetting(overlay) + ![Window.IsActive(107) | Window.IsActive(104) | Window.IsActive(10133) | Window.IsActive(10112) | Window.IsActive(0) | Window.IsActive(500) | Window.IsActive(50)]
